techmeme.title: Amazon acquires key assets of Indian video streaming service MX Player; a source says the deal values the streamer at $100M, below its $500M valuation in 2019 (Manish Singh/TechCrunch)
The FBI urges LockBit ransomware victims to come forward after obtaining 7,000+ decryption keys to recover data; police seized 2,500+ keys in February 2024 (Sergiu Gatlan/BleepingComputer)
Google rolls out its Gemini-powered note-taking assistant NotebookLM to 200+ new countries, including Brazil and the UK, and adds Slides and web URLs as sources (Jagmeet Singh/TechCrunch)
Robinhood plans to acquire crypto exchange Bitstamp for $200M, in a deal expected to close in H1 2025, and says Bitstamp will still operate under its own brand (Caitlin Ostroff/Wall Street Journal)
A look back at Sam Altman's career, starting as Loopt CEO before moving to YC and founding OpenAI in 2015, as many former allies now view his charm as duplicity (Ellen Huet/Bloomberg)
